mapper.select: select s.school_id, s.school_name, s.school_province from tb_school as s JOIN tb_province as p ON s.school_id = p.school_id JOIN tb_year as y ON p.province_id = y.province_id JOIN tb_category as c ON y.year_id = c.year_id JOIN tb_batch as b ON c.category_id = b.category_id JOIN tb_score as sc ON b.batch_id = sc.batch_id where sc.first_choice = #{firstChoice}
